CustomBehavior.Text: If you have a Hallowed Helm - it will be deleted on purpose

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag = 0,4,1 do for slot = 1, 32, 1 do local name = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot); if name and string.find(name,'Hallowed Helm') then PickupContainerItem(bag,slot); DeleteCursorItem(); end; end; end

CustomBehavior.Text: Get the Hallowed Helm out of your bank and delete it please!

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for bag = 0,4,1 do for slot = 1, 32, 1 do local name = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot); if name and string.find(name,'Hallowed Helm') then PickupContainerItem(bag,slot); DeleteCursorItem(); end; end; end
